content: the squish hat is well just that squish it uses frog it boucle dk and frog it merino worsted it is an easy-to-follow brioche hat that definitely ups the extra squishiness factor of the boucle yarn for the boucle you will need approximately 75 yards and for the worsted you will need approximately 50 yards the pattern includes written instructions as well as several videos for working brioche stitches and how to make the pom the squish hat fits close to the head as a beanie however if you would like a more slouchy hat you can knit the body longer before starting the decreases squish hat is free until jan 1 2025 just put it in your cart and check out
